extendedInfo.description: Do you need some last minute help? If you are Just About To give a presentation, have a difficult meeting, or even re-think your life, this app has lots of tips to help you. Should a difficult situation arise, this app will be at hand to bail you out. Subjects included are: - sales meetings - negotiations - being interviewed for a job - managing projects - making decisions - chairing and attending meetings - coaching - delegating - giving people bad news ***************************************** All tips written by Chris Croft of Chris Croft Training.

reviews.title: Saved my presentation today!
reviews.comment: Had a big presentation today and was really worried about it, but just used this app for some last minute advice and so glad I did. Really handy, practical, quick tips that can really make or break a situation. Brilliant!
reviews.author: Louise Croft

reviews.title: Google Nexus 7
reviews.comment: A small app with a very clear message. I also recommend signing up to Chris\'s tip emails. See the info section.
reviews.author: roger jones

reviews.title: Aster
reviews.comment: Great app. Comes in very useful, just said the \"O\" word....watch out kittens.
reviews.author: Nick Roberts

reviews.title: Brilliant little app
reviews.comment: Full of lots of great last minute tips
reviews.author: Ed Moyse
